WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

DefinedBenefitPlanFundedStatusOfPlan.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Funded (Unfunded) Status of Plan
DefinedBenefitPlanFundedStatusOfPlan.description: Amount of funded (unfunded) status of defined benefit plan, measured as difference between fair value of plan assets and benefit obligation. Includes, but is not limited to, overfunded (underfunded) status.

DefinedContributionPlanCostRecognized.label: Defined Contribution Plan, Cost
DefinedContributionPlanCostRecognized.description: Amount of cost for defined contribution plan.

DefinedContributionPlanIncreaseDecreaseC.label: Defined Contribution Plan, Increase (Decrease), Cost
DefinedContributionPlanIncreaseDecreaseC.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cost for defined contribution plan.

DividendsPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Dividends Payable
DividendsPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of dividends declared but unpaid on equity securities issued by the entity and outstanding.

GainLossOnSaleOfOtherAssets.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Other Assets
GainLossOnSaleOfOtherAssets.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of other assets.

GainLossOnSaleOfPropertyPlantEquipment.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Property Plant Equipment
GainLossOnSaleOfPropertyPlantEquipment.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of property, plant and equipment assets, including oil and gas property and timber property.

ImpairmentOfLongLivedAssetsHeldForUse.label: Impairment of Long-Lived Assets Held-for-use
ImpairmentOfLongLivedAssetsHeldForUse.description: The aggregate amount of write-downs for impairments recognized during the period for long lived assets held for use (including those held for disposal by means other than sale).

MultiemployerPlanPensionInsignificantPla.label: Multiemployer Plan, Pension, Insignificant, Plan Contribution
MultiemployerPlanPensionInsignificantPla.description: Amount of contribution received by multiemployer pension plan from all employers participating in multiemployer pension plan determined to be individually insignificant.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesTreasurySto.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares, Treasury Stock
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesTreasurySto.description: Number of shares of treasury stock determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that treasury shares have been outstanding to the total time in that period. Treasury stock is stock that the Entity has issued but subsequently reacquired.

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableRe.label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Recovery
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableRe.description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable, from recovery.

PensionAndOtherPostretirementBenefitsExp.label: Pension and Other Postretirement Benefits Expense (Reversal of Expense), Noncash
PensionAndOtherPostretirementBenefitsExp.description: Amount of noncash expense (reversal of expense) for pension and other postretirement benefits.

TreasuryStockReissuedAtLowerThanRepurcha.label: Treasury Stock Reissued at Lower than Repurchase Price
TreasuryStockReissuedAtLowerThanRepurcha.description: In cases when treasury stock is reissued at a price lower than the cost to repurchase, the excess difference between the selling price and cost to repurchase is charged against retained earnings (assuming that all APIC arising from treasury stock transactions has first been exhausted).

CapitalExpendituresIncurredButNotYetPaid.label: Capital Expenditures Incurred but Not yet Paid
CapitalExpendituresIncurredButNotYetPaid.description: Future cash outflow to pay for purchases of fixed assets that have occurred.

CapitalizedContractCostGross.label: Capitalized Contract Cost, Gross
CapitalizedContractCostGross.description: Amount, before accumulated amortization and accumulated impairment loss, of asset recognized from cost incurred to obtain or fulfill contract with customer.

DebtWeightedAverageInterestRate.label: Debt, Weighted Average Interest Rate
DebtWeightedAverageInterestRate.description: Weighted average interest rate of debt outstanding.

DeferredFinanceCostsGross.label: Debt Issuance Costs, Gross
DeferredFinanceCostsGross.description: Amount, before accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

DeferredFinanceCostsNet.label: Debt Issuance Costs, Net
DeferredFinanceCostsNet.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesUndistributedForei.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Undistributed Foreign Earnings
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesUndistributedForei.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from undistributed earnings of subsidiary and other recognized entity not within country of domicile. Includes, but is not limited to, other basis differences.

LitigationReserveCurrent.label: Estimated Litigation Liability, Current
LitigationReserveCurrent.description: Carrying amount of reserve for known or estimated probable loss from litigation, which may include attorneys' fees and other litigation costs, which is expected to be paid within one year of the date of the statement of financial position.

TreasuryStockCommonShares.label: Treasury Stock, Common, Shares
TreasuryStockCommonShares.description: Number of previously issued common shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

TreasuryStockCommonValue.label: Treasury Stock, Common, Value
TreasuryStockCommonValue.description: Amount allocated to previously issued common shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.
